articles.author: Ellise Shafer
articles.title: ‘Joker 2’ Gets R Rating for ‘Strong Violence’ and ‘Brief Full Nudity’ - Variety
articles.description: 'Joker: Folie à Deux' has been rated R by the Motion Picture Association, it was revealed on Wednesday.
articles.content:
“Joker: Folie à Deux” has been rated R by the Motion Picture Association, it was revealed on Wednesday.
The musical sequel to 2019’s “Joker,” starring Joaquin Phoenix and Lady Gaga, has been rated R… [+1557 chars]
